scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Rachel (TheShadesofOrange)
scrape.text: I was really hoping to like this one, but I was completely disappointed. The main complaint I heard was the unlikeable characters, which I didn't think would be a problem because I don't always need likeable characters. However, I just found this book dry and boring. I found the writing especially poor, which may be due to the fact that it was translated.
